His bro____ Freddy i_ adopted a__ of Korean descent, and n__ lives i_ New York. His stepsons both moved on after college, and they now call Ohio home.
data.fullContent: Bob has a diverse family, who live in disparate areas. His half-sister resides in Colorado, and is a single mom just trying to get by. His brother Freddy is adopted and of Korean descent, and now lives in New York. His stepsons both moved on after college, and they now call Ohio home.
data.answer: 鲍勃有一个多元化的家庭，他们住在不同的地区。他同父异母的妹妹住在科罗拉多州，是一位单身母亲，生活艰难。他的哥哥Freddy是被收养的韩国人，现在住在纽约。他的两个继子在大学毕业后都搬走了，现在他们把俄亥俄州当作自己的家。
